resources.string: You are about to update the firmware of %1$s with the firmware revision %2$s. All settings of %1$s will be preserved.

During firmware update the USB device will reboot multiples times, and Android will pop up a dialogue to allow the allow %1$s to access USB devices. You need to authorise %1$s to access USB device otherwise the firmware update will finish correctly and you may lost your settings.

Also, if you have other applications that have register access to Yoctopuce devices, Android may ask you if you want to start these other activity. you need to deny USB accept to all application except %1$s.
Please do not power off your Android device, or exit the application during the firmware update.

If you have trouble with %1$s application please contact support@yoctopuce.com

Application version: %2$s
Yoctopuce API : %3$s

www.yoctopuce.com
Plug a Yoctopuce module to your USB port
